description: Saint Francis appears here surrounded by symbols associated with his sainthood. The book, for example, speaks to his devotional studies, and the skull is a reminder of the inevitability of death. The painting prompts the viewer to meditate upon the saint in the same way that he prays before the sculpture of the crucified Jesus.
artist_info:
El Greco (Doménikos Theotokópoulos; Greek
active in Spain, 1541–1614)
title: Saint Francis Kneeling in Meditation
